text: Eduardo Vincente Mirás (14 November 1929 – 24 February 2022) was an Argentine Roman Catholic prelate. He became a priest in 1952. He was titular bishop of Ambia and as auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Buenos Aires from 1984 to 1994 and as archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Rosario, Argentina, from 1994 to 2005.Eduardo Vincente Miras Mirás died from problems caused by COVID-19 on 24 February 2022 in Rosario, Argentina at the age of 92 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Argentina. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:People from Santa Fe, Argentina Category:Argentine Roman Catholic bishops Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Argentina Category:People from Rosario, Argentina
title: Eduardo Mirás
